mill.title: Domtar
mill.description: Domtar is the largest integrated marketer and manufacturer of uncoated freesheet paper in North America and second largest in the world. We have 10 pulp and paper mills (eight in the United States and two in Canada), with an annual paper production capacity of approximately 3.4 million tons of uncoated freesheet paper. Our paper manufacturing operations are supported by 15 converting and distribution operations including a network of 12 plants located offsite of our paper making operations. Also, we have forms manufacturing operations at three offsite converting and distribution operations. Approximately 79% of our paper production capacity is in the U.S. and the remaining 21% is located in Canada.
mill.address:
100 Kingsley Park Drive
Fort Mill (SC) United-States
29715-6476

mill.title: Finch Paper
mill.description:
Finch specializes in high-bright, uncoated paper for digital and traditional printing markets, manufacturing more than 250,000 tons per year from its integrated pulp and paper mill in Glen Falls.

Finch sets itself apart by providing innovative solutions and exceptional service to help customers adapt to the changing print world. Using advanced manufacturing systems, the 700-employee company produces a broad portfolio of opaque, text and cover, and digital papers for multi-press environments. Finch products are used for corporate marketing material, direct mail, book publishing, transactional/transpromo statements, and business office use.

At Finch, their promise is simple: affordable products, proudly made in the U.S.A. with environmental integrity, and delivered with the type of personal service that you will respect and remember.
mill.address:
Finch Paper LLC
One Glen Street
Glens Falls, NY 12801

mill.title: Georgia-Pacific
mill.description:
Georgia-Pacific is one of the world's leading manufacturers and marketers of tissue, packaging, paper, pulp, building products and related chemicals with nearly 35,000 employees worldwide. Headquartered in Atlanta, GA, Georgia-Pacific is an independently managed and operated subsidiary of Koch Industries, Inc., a private company headquartered in Wichita, KS.

The Atlanta-based Communication Papers Division of Georgia-Pacific Consumer Products LP produces uncoated free sheet imaging papers in the United States at its large, modern and fully integrated mills in Pt. Hudson, LA and Camas, WA, providing a reliable & robust manufacturing base that is well-situated to serve the North American market. In addition to producing Spectrum®, Georgia-Pacific®, Advantage®, Image Plus® and private label cut-size products, Georgia-Pacific makes a variety of Spectrum® brand 92 and 96 bright white paper grades in roll form that satisfy the needs of many high speed web-fed inkjet imaging applications. High volume printers require trouble-free printing, uniform quality and consistent results. Georgia-Pacific Spectrum® papers provide substrate choices for a variety of printing jobs from publishing to graphic communications to transactional statements and business documents.

mill.title: International Paper
mill.description: Founded in 1898, International Paper has grown into the world’s largest paper and packaging products company. As long as inkjet printers have been around, International Paper, has made the paper to make them shine. We have applied extensive knowledge to developing exceptional paper for high speed digital presses. Our portfolio of inkjet paper keeps the ink on top of the sheet and gives you brilliant color and remarkable clarity that you have to see to believe. International Paper offers a variety of inkjet paper solutions including Accent® Opaque Dyemond™, Accent Opaque with ImageLok®, Williamsburg with ImageLok, and DataSpeed® forms products.
mill.address:
International Paper 
6400 Poplar Avenue
Memphis, TN 38197

mill.title: Appvion Paper
mill.description: Canon Solutions America and others have approved our Treated High-Speed Inkjet Paper to run on their web-format inkjet presses with either dye-based or pigment-based aqueous inks. And the print quality will reveal a world of subtle difference.

mill.title: Cham
mill.description: Cham Paper Group is a leader in papers for digital large format printing and industrial inkjet printing. The range also includes sublimation papers for digital textile printing and inkjet papers, which are coated on both sides, for high-speed inkjet printing. The products are developed and tested, in consultation with our customers, in our in-house laboratory and produced on one of our two state of the art coating machines, as a jumbo roll or equipped plotter rolls.

mill.title: Catalyst Paper
mill.description: As western North America's largest producer of mechanical printing paper and a recognized leader in sustainable business practices, Catalyst Paper manufactures a broad range of high quality products ideally suited to our times.
mill.address:
2nd Floor, 3600 Lysander Lane
Richmond, British Columbia, Canada

mill.title: Enterprise Group
mill.description: Enterprise Group is a Domtar business. Products, services, solutions…we stand with our customers. Our product offerings includes digital papers, inkjet rolls, converting rolls, office papers, continuous forms, wide format, and the entire Xerox Paper and Specialty Media line. With a service platform that includes an expansive national distribution network with experienced local account managers and knowledgeable sales service representatives, Enterprise Group provides customers with quality products and services. As a Domtar business, we are committed to meeting the highest standards for forest, environmental, and quality management.

mill.title: Flambeau River Papers
mill.description: Flambeau River Papers offers a wide variety of premium paper products manufactured in our state-of-the-art mill. The paper’s quality is superior—the whitest available—and our processes are designed to minimize negative impact on the environment. Our diverse range of papers meets business needs including printing, specialty, art, and book papers.

mill.title: Glatfelter
mill.description: A global supplier of specialty paper and engineered products, Glatfelter delivers more than quality paper products. Going beyond paper is our promise to our customers, based on over a century and a half of experience and technical expertise and supported by new best-in-class processes.

mill.title: Mitsubishi Europe
mill.description:
Passion for first-class high-tech paper
Inkjet, direct thermal, carbonless or label papers – the range of products from Germany based Mitsubishi HiTec Paper offers first-class coated specialty papers for all fields of use. The products meet the highest technological standards and are true high-tech papers. Because they combine the know-how of experienced paper makers with an excellent coating technology and a professional converting. 

Under the brand JETSCRIPT Mitsubishi HiTec Paper offers a wide range of coated inkjet papers designed for high-speed inkjet printing. For all applications. For all digital inkjet printing systems. Even inkjet paper with build-in security features. The high performance JETSCRIPT papers for transaction & transpromo, direct mail, publishing, envelopes and security applications maximize print quality and efficiency. Unique product features such as the ink receiving layer, the large color gamut and the universal dye and pigment ink compatibility lead to optimum print results even in most demanding, all-over prints.

mill.title: Mitsubishi Japan
mill.description: Under the brand JETSCRIPT Mitsubishi HiTec Paper offers a wide range of coated inkjet papers designed for high-speed inkjet printing. For all applications. For all digital inkjet printing systems. Even inkjet paper with build-in security features. The high performance JETSCRIPT papers for transaction & transpromo, direct mail, publishing, envelopes and security applications maximize print quality and efficiency. Unique product features such as the ink receiving layer, the large color gamut and the universal dye and pigment ink compatibility lead to optimum print results even in most demanding, all-over prints.

mill.title: MONDI PAPER SALES GMBH
mill.description:
Mondi is an international packaging and paper Group, employing around 26,000 people in production facilities across 31 countries. In 2013, Mondi had revenues of €6.5 billion and a ROCE of 15.3%. The Group's key operations are located in central Europe, Russia, the Americas and South Africa.

 Mondi Uncoated Fine Paper is a business unit of Mondi’s Europe & International Division. In 4 paper mills in Austria, Slovakia, Russia and South Africa, Mondi Uncoated Fine Paper produces environmentally sound office and professional printing papers tailored to the latest professional digital print technology. The company complies with the strictest international certification standards to support sustainable production processes through the responsible management of forest, water and air resources. All Mondi uncoated fine papers belong to the Green Range of papers that are FSC® or PEFC™ certified, 100% recycled or bleached entirely without chlorine.

mill.title: NorPac
mill.description: NORPAC newsprint delivers excellent runnability and is available in standard basis weights for U.S. and international newspapers. With several brightness options, these uncoated mechanical grades are ideal for offset printing and many free-sheet applications. Specialty grades are also available for unique printing or converting needs.
